about_the_game:
Wanna see Drake Yume on your desktop? Download now, make your desktop a new home for Drake Yume, and start a journey with virtual companions! Deskmate offers a EDU(Education Simulation) like gameplay, get in touch with Drake Yume, and train Yume to your liking! Deskmate support neural network based voice recognition and generation, as well as chat interactions based on character personalities.

Highlights

  • Chat with Drake Yume -- Interact with virtual characters through text, voice, or even gestures* Engage in playful banter, express emotions, and even seek answers to your questions or have heart-to-heart conversations, experiencing a fun and novel way of chatting.

  • Observe Drake Yume's daily life - -We can see Drake Yume's daily life now!

Features

  • Supports text and voice input, voice wake-up, and voice command control
  • Unique character responses with proactive interactions, supports active response
  • Neural network-based voice synthesis responses, emotionally rich and genuine like real
  • Real-time rendering of anime stylized 3D character models with automatic generated motion
  • Heavily optimized software with low system resource usage, ensuring smooth performance during regular use

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
